mdRecord.dcterms:title: Williamsburg, May 31, 1774, Gentlemen, Last Sunday morning several letters, were received: [Summons to the Richmond Convention] / [signed] Peyton Randolph, moderator; Robert C. Nicholas, Edmund Pendleton .. Thomas Jefferson [and others]
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Virginia. General Assembly. House of Burgesses.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Issued to members of the House of Burgesses prorogated by Gov. Dunsmore on May 26, 1774.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Addressed on verso to Edmund Berkeley. Tracy W. McGregor Library, American History Collection.
